tool.name: generate_3D_surface_plot
tool.description: Generates a surface plot of a 3D synthetic image.
tool.help:
**Description**
Generates a surface plot from a 3D synthetic image.
-----
**Input**
- A 3D Synthetic Image - View Angle on x-Direction - View Angle on y-Direction - Alpha-Value
-----
**Output**
- A PNG file of the surface plot
-----
**Example**
The 3D surface plot tool displays the following image using the default parameters. The 3D synthetic image is from demo3D00.
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/issue85/tools/cellorganizer/images/surface_plot.png :height: 250 :target: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/issue85/tools/cellorganizer/images/surface_plot.png -----
